name: MVC
tagline: I have created a small but very effective MVC framework for PHP. You can create small to mid size MVC application using this framework.
body:
mvc
===

I have created a small but very effective MVC framework for PHP. You can create small to mid size MVC application using this framework.

I shall update it whenever get time. You all are requested to do the same if you interested. Also you can send me mail to dhiraj.patra@gmail.com

Thanks.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
